channel.title: Pi "nbk"
channel.description:
Well, I'm using Phaze's awesome PI base, (Thanks to him) [s]And I can't figure out how to change the Header on the Client.[/s]Fixed - Thanks Jon. [s] [s]Also, In game, when you login, I can't figure out how to change it it says.
Welcome to "+Config.SERVER_NAME+"
and I don't know where to change server name, like the config server name..[/s] Fixed - Thanks Jon. Can I add customs to this? Anyone got a guide on how to convert Ancient prayers on a 317 loading 377?? Thanks for anyone who helps, msn is pritchardthomas@yahoo.com, I will pay if you help alot ;)

item.title: Pi "nbk"
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Well, I’m using Phaze’s awesome PI base, (Thanks to him)

And I can’t figure out how to change the Header on the Client.Fixed - Thanks Jon.
[s]
[s]Also, In game, when you login, I can’t figure out how to change it it says.

Welcome to "+Config.SERVER_NAME+"
and I don't know where to change server name, like the config server name..[/s] Fixed - Thanks Jon.

Can I add customs to this?
Anyone got a guide on how to convert Ancient prayers on a 317 loading 377??

Thanks for anyone who helps, msn is pritchardthomas@yahoo.com, I will pay if you help alot
